text:
@realDonaldTrump How about caring the US soldiers have a Russian bounty on their lives or the 127,000+ who have died from covid-19 while you played golf, held rallies and fundraisers?

FAILURE as president.
FAILURE as an American.
FAILURE as a human. https://t.co/9Pe6gFZbnF
